statements: SELECT * FROM patient_feedback;
SELECT patient_id, satisfaction_score FROM patient_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 4;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM patient_feedback ORDER BY feedback_timestamp DESC;
SELECT survey_date, satisfaction_score FROM patient_feedback WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT patient_id, survey_date FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 4;
SELECT patient_id, survey_date, satisfaction_score FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_timestamp >= '2022-02-01' ORDER BY feedback_timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback, AVG(satisfaction_score) AS avg_score FROM patient_feedback WHERE survey_date > '2021-12-01';
SELECT * FROM PatientFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM PatientFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT survey_id, patient_id, overall_rating FROM SurveyResults WHERE overall_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM PatientFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, feedback_text FROM PatientFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM PatientFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating = 5 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM PatientFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' AND feedback_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM PatientFeedback INNER JOIN SurveyResults ON PatientFeedback.patient_id = SurveyResults.patient_id WHERE SurveyResults.overall_rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC, survey_date DESC
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM PatientFeedback WHERE patient_id = 12345 AND satisfaction_rating = 4
SELECT survey_id, patient_id, survey_date FROM SurveyResults WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY survey_date
SELECT * FROM Patient_Satisfaction_Surveys ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT survey_rating, patient_id FROM Patient_Satisfaction_Surveys WHERE survey_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM Teleoncology_Services WHERE service_cost < 1000;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM Teleoncology_Services WHERE service_cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM Feedback_History ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT survey_id, patient_id, survey_rating, survey_date, feedback_text FROM Patient_Satisfaction_Surveys WHERE survey_rating > 3 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT service_id, service_name, service_description, service_cost FROM Teleoncology_Services WHERE service_cost < 1000;
SELECT feedback_id, survey_id, feedback_text, feedback_rating, feedback_date FROM Feedback_History ORDER BY feedback_date ASC, feedback_rating DESC;
SELECT survey_id, patient_id, survey_rating, survey_date FROM Patient_Satisfaction_Surveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT service_id, service_name, service_cost FROM Teleoncology_Services WHERE service_name LIKE '%teleoncology%' ORDER BY service_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT appointment_date, notes FROM appointments WHERE oncologist_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, satisfaction_rating, survey_date FROM surveys ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' LIMIT 10
SELECT appointment_date, oncologist_id FROM appointments WHERE notes LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients JOIN surveys ON patients.patient_id = surveys.patient_id
SELECT * FROM oncologists WHERE years_of_experience > 10 ORDER BY specialty
SELECT * FROM patient_info;
SELECT patient_name, email_address FROM patient_info;
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth, contact_number FROM patient_info WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT feedback, satisfaction_rating FROM survey_responses WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT doctor_name, department FROM appointment_history ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_info WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, doctor_name, department FROM appointment_history ORDER BY appointment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT diagnosis_description, treating_physician FROM patient_diagnosis WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT feedback_text, staff_name FROM service_feedback WHERE service_rating < 4;
